scripts.release:prep:fetch: git fetch git@github.com:k88hudson/releasetest.git develop:_TEMP_DEVELOP && git fetch git@github.com:k88hudson/releasetest.git master:_TEMP_MASTER
scripts.release:push: git push git@github.com:k88hudson/releasetest.git _TEMP_MASTER:master --tags && git checkout _TEMP_DEVELOP && git merge _TEMP_MASTER && git push git@github.com:k88hudson/releasetest.git _TEMP_DEVELOP:develop
